## strEnsurePrefix() function

确保字符串有特定前缀，没有则添加

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function strEnsurePrefix(s: string, prefix: string): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  s | string | 字符串 |
|  prefix | string | 前缀 |

**Returns:**

string

确保有前缀的字符串
